verbs.description: ON THE ROAD - ADAM CRAFTON : Among all [ARG0: we] [V: foresaw] [ARG1: Donald Trump might destroy during his Presidency] , Dagenham & Redbridge was never a contender .
ON THE ROAD - ADAM CRAFTON : Among all we foresaw Donald Trump [V: might] destroy during his Presidency , Dagenham & Redbridge was never a contender .
ON THE ROAD - ADAM CRAFTON : Among all we foresaw [ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: might] [V: destroy] [ARGM-TMP: during his Presidency] , Dagenham & Redbridge was never a contender .
ON THE ROAD - ADAM CRAFTON : [ARGM-ADV: Among all we foresaw Donald Trump might destroy during his Presidency] , [ARG1: Dagenham & Redbridge] [V: was] [ARGM-TMP: never] [ARG2: a contender] .
